item_descriptions.map: An old, worn map of the surrounding area. It might help you navigate.
item_descriptions.bread: A fresh loaf of bread. It looks delicious and nutritious.
item_descriptions.stick: A sturdy wooden stick. It could be used as a simple weapon or tool.
item_descriptions.berries: A handful of colorful berries. They might be edible... or not.
item_descriptions.torch: A flaming torch that provides light in dark areas.
item_descriptions.gemstone: A sparkling gemstone. It looks valuable.
item_descriptions.rope: A coil of strong rope. Useful for climbing or tying things.
item_descriptions.pickaxe: A sturdy pickaxe. Perfect for mining or breaking through rocks.
item_descriptions.mushrooms: Some wild mushrooms. They could be edible or poisonous.
item_descriptions.mountain_herbs: Rare medicinal herbs found on the mountain. They might have healing properties.
item_descriptions.ancient_coin: An old coin with strange markings. It might be valuable to collectors.
item_descriptions.hermit's_blessing: A mystical blessing from the mountain hermit. It fills you with energy.
item_descriptions.gold_coin: A shiny gold coin. Standard currency in this realm.
item_descriptions.silver_necklace: A delicate silver necklace. It could fetch a good price.
item_descriptions.ancient_artifact: A mysterious object from a long-lost civilization. Its purpose is unknown.
item_descriptions.magic_ring: A ring imbued with magical properties. Its effects are yet to be discovered.
item_descriptions.mysterious_potion: A vial containing a strange, swirling liquid. Its effects are unknown.
item_descriptions.sword: A well-crafted sword with a sharp blade. Useful for combat and self-defense.
